row.name: CONN_ENDPOINT_URL#
row.xui:
<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="CONN_ENDPOINT_URLs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="URL Endpoint" tooltip="This URL specifies the entry point of the REST service.
